CustomField.description: ** CONDITIONALLY REQUIRED ** SOQL query WHERE clause for automating the transition to this status on the Event. A value for this field is required when the Enable Transition for Status checkbox is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** CONDITIONALLY REQUIRED ** SOQL query WHERE clause for automating the transition to this status on the Event. A value for this field is required when the Enable Transition for Status checkbox is checked.
CustomField.label: Status Transition Criteria
